turns.speaker: client
turns.text: place an order for pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: take me to armandos pizza place

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: would like to order 2 pepperoni pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how many cuts per pie would u like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like 12 cuts

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any extra toppings

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: extra cheese on the 2 pepperoni pies

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what about the white pizza

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you please add spinach to that please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would that be pick up or delivery

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like to have that delivered

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and where would that be

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 123 one street, is delivery available to that address

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes it is with a 2 dollar delivery charge

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that would be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: may i have your phone number please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would there be anything else you would liek to add

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you please add a 2 liter of pepsi please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes and how would you want to pay for this

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i would like to use my credit card

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i see we have that information on file

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: what is the location that you will be coming from

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we are on the south side

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how long before my order is delivered

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we should have it to you in about 45 mins``

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that would be great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else that you might need

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yw enjoy your delivery
